Patch Set 15: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully rebased and submitted as bab2bedab1ccf3d36fa7f7cb063b06a0a6888eb4
Please add why this change was required and what was the issue without this change.
Ack
User didn't pass any offset, but the trace says Invalid offset passed. Can you please handle the traces.
Ack
User didn't pass any offset, but the trace says Invalid offset passed. Can you please handle the traces.
Ack
same here. please handle redundant EEPROM case. When the user provides redundant EEPROM path for the FRU with "redundantEEPROM" flag in vpd json, vpd-tool should be able to perform operations.
Ack
why this change is required? why you removed rc variable?
It was not used anywhere.
Done

Please handle redundantEEPROM case.
When the user provides redundant EEPROM path for the FRU with "redundantEEPROM" flag in vpd json, vpd-tool should be able to perform operations.
As discussed made other changes.

This code will not work in case condition at line 633 evaluates to false i.e where JSON is not containing the fruPath.
Please test the negative paths as well.
Ack
Not able to follow the flow here.
You mean you want else?
I want to understand what is the flow now.
It's checking whether fruPath exists and sets the given offset if not found, else takes offset from json and is checked with given offset.
Ack
Have blank lines between code blocks. Makes the code more readable.
Ack

Please have at least these two sections in commit message when changing existing flow.
What and Why.

Why missing in this case.

Also don't just paste commands.
Have a line about what you are testing then paste the commands. Applies for each set of test commands.
Ack
C++ string constructor takes care of initialization. These initialization is not required.
Yeah.
Ack
What is the inventory path in case it is redundant fru?
Not required, redundant FRU should not be there.
Hence, may not be required, as there is no details in json.

Don't mark comments as resolved in following scenario:-
1) If you dis-agree with the comment and are not willing to make any change w.r.t that.
2) If it is a conversation where question is asked against some scenario. As you can't be sure if your answer actually addresses the query.

In both these cases, it should be the responsibility of reviewer who gave the comment to mark it as resolved.

Now, coming back to the query. What will happen when inventory path remains as blank in this case?

Please note the previous comments given, it was marked resolved based on that.
It's ambiguous to that case.

Now coming to the query, inventoryPath will not be there in PEL if ECC error, which is not required as FRU is known and it should not be tool's concern.
Ack
The reason for this change is not just to inform the user. With "why" I meant what is the problem being faced when this change is not there.
Ack
Done
Though the issue of overriding is not there, I'm pushing it to address offset issue in general, and handling fru paths not in json gracefully

wrap the commit message contents to 72 characters per line.
please refer https://cbea.ms/git-commit/
Ack. It's recommended suggestion, though but the limit is 80
what is a normal FRU?
I2C VPD FRUs.
please remove machine specific details from commit message.
This is not necessary, though have acknowledged.

can you change the print statement as
"Invalid offset. Please provide correct offset". "Recommended offset is 0".
Ack
can you please add a new line in code, before printing the statement "Did you provide a.. "
Ack
can you add in the test case, on what happens when invalid offset is provided for eeprom path which is not present in JSON?
Okay, as discussed, I'll add wrong offset one, along with no offset[equivalent to 0], but as is test case, so

this else will get executed only when the user given offset matches with the offset taken from json.
if both are equal, why can't you use the user given offset only? why line 677 is required?
correction in the above comment, else case will get executed only for frupaths not present in json and for that we have to make use of the offset given by user. so else is not required.
Ack
Fix this.
Ack
Merged downstream on 14/7
